Introduction

Seunghyuk South Korean singer underMyDoll Entertainment. He is part of the upcoming male duo TMC and a former member of the boy group Apeace and its sub-unit ONYX5.

He made his debut with Apeace on March 14, 2012 by releasing their first Japanese mini album We Are The One.

He joined MyDoll Entertainment on November 8, 2022 and formed the duo TMC.

On May 10, 2024, Seunghyuk was announced as a member of the upcoming co-ed group ToTh6y.
